overview:
Davide (degree in economics and business) has more than 10 years of experience in Internet business: designing web and software applications; managing virtual communities; offshore programming; web-marketing and Internet PR; BDM and sales.

–> In 1999 won the WWW Sole24Ore Award for University.it (more than 150,000 university students registered and more than 40,000 documents published) of which he was founder (1998) and CEO.

–> In 2004 he founded ConsultingSoft (previously based in United States and now in Italy): Italian based project managers and offshore coders.

–> In 2007 he founded PositiveADV a company specialized in Web Marketing and Internet PR.

–> In 2009 he founded ClickMeter the online service to track pay-per-click campaigns and prevent click fraud.

He is the author of some articles regarding world of internet and new technologies for important national magazines. He is always commit himself to reach best results in Internet business.

Specialties: Internet business development; software and web UI design; build and manage communities online; web marketing; web analytics; business and marketing plans; online PR.
